W

writeCoapRequest(CoapRequest) - Method in class de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.application.CoapClientApplication
This method should be used by extending client implementation to send a CoAP request to a remote recipient.
writeRequested(ChannelHandlerContext, MessageEvent) - Method in class de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.communication.callback.ResponseCallbackHandler
This method handles downstream message events.
writeRequested(ChannelHandlerContext, MessageEvent) - Method in class de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.communication.reliability.IncomingMessageReliabilityHandler
If the message to be written is a CoapResponse this method decides whether the message type is MsgType.ACK (if there wasn't an empty acknowledgement sent yet) or MsgType.CON (if there already was an empty acknowledgement sent).
writeRequested(ChannelHandlerContext, MessageEvent) - Method in class de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.communication.reliability.OutgoingMessageReliabilityHandler
This method is invoked with a downstream message event.
